document.full_text: after nearly 16 years, six studio albums, a live set and a greatest hits package -- the foo fighters are finally heading for their first no. 1 album next week.
document.title: foo fighters flying towards first no. 1 album
lines_and_colors: after nearly 16 years, six studio albums, a live set and a greatest hits package -- the foo fighters are finally heading for their first no. 1 album next week.
